scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend && npm run dev:frontend
scripts.deploy:backend:dev: npm run build:backend && wrangler deploy --config insight-hunter-backend/wrangler.toml --env=dev
scripts.deploy:backend:prod: npm run build:backend && wrangler deploy --config insight-hunter-backend/wrangler.toml --env=prod
scripts.deploy:frontend:dev: npm run build:frontend && wrangler pages deploy insight-hunter-frontend/dist --project-name insight-hunter-frontend-dev
scripts.deploy:frontend:prod: npm run build:frontend && wrangler pages deploy insight-hunter-frontend/dist --project-name insight-hunter-frontend-prod
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run deploy:backend:dev && npm run deploy:frontend:dev
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:backend:prod && npm run deploy:frontend:prod
